reference.title: cxxFriendExplicit
reference.shortdesc: Marks a friend function (that must always be a constructor) as qualified with the C++ keyword explicit.

section.title: Description
section.p: The <cxxFriendExplicit> element marks a friend function as explicit. The friend function must be a constructor. The <cxxFriendExplicit> element has two mandatory attributes: name and value.
The explicit specifier shall be used only in declarations of constructors within a class declaration; see ISO/IEC 14882:2003(E) 12.3.1.
